manifest.author: Charlie Chao
manifest.name: Upcoming
manifest.description: Open upcoming and/or past daily notes in their own panes, tabs, or windows.

manifest.author: Ellpeck
manifest.name: Just Share Please
manifest.description: Quickly and easily share individual notes online using an anonymized link. Also easy to self-host!

manifest.author: James Greenhalgh CITP MBCS
manifest.name: Quick note
manifest.description: Create a quick note in a floating window (on command or by right-clicking the Obsidian app icon)

manifest.author: eoureo
manifest.name: RunJS
manifest.description: Run easily JavaScript codes for managing Obsidian and its notes.

manifest.author: Brian Boucheron
manifest.name: Draft Indicator
manifest.description: Show draft status with ✎ icons in the file explorer.

manifest.author: datawitch
manifest.name: Recursive Copy
manifest.description: Recursively copies all markdown files in a folder, concatenates them, and copies them into the clipboard. Useful for quickly loading context into AI. Can be triggered by right clicking a folder and selecting the context menu item, or by binding a key (will copy everything in the active file's folder).

manifest.author: Richard Xiong
manifest.name: Google Drive Sync
manifest.description: Syncs a vault into Google Drive for cross-platform use (works for iOS).

manifest.author: KIKIJIKI
manifest.name: Kikijiki Habit Tracker
manifest.description: A simple habit tracker

manifest.author: luxmargos
manifest.name: Canvas Card Background Remover
manifest.description: You can make the background of cards transparent in the Canvas

manifest.author: Xaver Wenhart
manifest.name: NerdFont Icon Picker
manifest.description: Search and insert nerdfont icons.

manifest.author: Mason Bryant
manifest.name: Tagvis
manifest.description: Tag visualization for those that are into that kind of thing.

manifest.author: make.md
manifest.name: make.md
manifest.description: make.md gives you everything you need to organize and personalize your notes.

manifest.author: caronchen
manifest.name: Charts View
manifest.description: Data visualization solution in Obsidian based on Ant Design Charts.

manifest.author: Yulei Chen
manifest.name: Ketcher
manifest.description: View or draw chemical structures and reactions using Ketcher.

manifest.author: Kacper Darowski
manifest.name: Battery Indicator
manifest.description: Displays current battery level in the status bar.

manifest.author: xRyul
manifest.name: Link Navigation
manifest.description: Navigate between incoming links (inlinks), outgoing links (outlinks) N levels deep. Links from Canvas are also supported.

manifest.author: Sébastien Dubois
manifest.name: Dataview Serializer
manifest.description: Serialize Dataview queries to Markdown, and keep the Markdown representation up to date.

manifest.author: Oliver Balfour
manifest.name: Pandoc Plugin
manifest.description: This is a Pandoc export plugin for Obsidian. It provides commands to export to formats like DOCX, ePub and PDF.

manifest.author: Cloud Atlas
manifest.name: ICS
manifest.description: Parse multiple ICS files to include in your notes. Designed for Daily Notes and the Day Planner format. Through templates you can customize it for other use cases.

manifest.author: masaki39
manifest.name: Outline Converter
manifest.description: Convert outline to continuous text.

manifest.author: Otavio Cordeiro
manifest.name: Micro.publish
manifest.description: Publish notes to Micro.blog

manifest.author: rooyca
manifest.name: APIRequest
manifest.description: Fetch data from APIs or other sources. Responses in JSON, MD or HTML directly in your notes.

manifest.author: Aleksey Rowan
manifest.name: Vim Yank Highlight
manifest.description: Highlight yanked text in Vim mode. Enjoy that subtle animation you've missed so much.

manifest.name: Auto Anki
manifest.description: Using GPT to automate card creation for Spaced Repetiton in Anki

manifest.author: Howard Wilson
manifest.name: Strava Sync
manifest.description: Sync activities from Strava.

manifest.author: Henry Gustafson
manifest.name: Bottom to Top
manifest.description: Reverses direction of text.

manifest.author: Kh4f
manifest.name: Manual Sorting
manifest.description: Drag'n'Drop sorting within file explorer.

manifest.author: Andrea Alberti
manifest.name: Import Attachments+
manifest.description: Move and link the attachments into the vault.

manifest.author: Ozan Tellioglu
manifest.name: File Tree Alternative
manifest.description: This plugin allows you to have an alternative file tree view.

manifest.author: Mohammad Razeghi
manifest.name: Image Search
manifest.description: Search and insert images using Google API

manifest.author: Ian Inkov
manifest.name: Attachments MD Indexer

manifest.author: Jinmu Go
manifest.name: Markdown Flip
manifest.description: flip markdown line types with smart shortcuts

manifest.name: Consistent Attachments and Links
manifest.description: This plugin ensures the consistency of attachments and links

manifest.name: File Property Enhancer

manifest.name: Booksidian

manifest.name: Memorization

manifest.author: Alan Grainger
manifest.name: Air Quotes
manifest.description: Search and insert quotes from a source text as you type. This is great for reading a physical book or eReader while taking notes on a separate laptop or phone. The plugin can also convert ePub files to Markdown notes.

manifest.author: take6
manifest.name: Auto Hyperlink
manifest.description: Insert hyperlink according to user-defined rule

manifest.author: Boninall
manifest.name: Better Reading Mode
manifest.description: A plugin to enable better reading mode in Live preview mode of Obsidian, which works similar to bionic reading mode.

manifest.author: Jacob Levernier
manifest.name: Carry-Forward
manifest.description: An Obsidian Notes plugin for generating and copying block IDs and for copying lines with links to the copied line.

manifest.author: WakaTime
manifest.name: WakaTime
manifest.description: Automatic time tracking and metrics generated from your Obsidian usage activity.

manifest.author: Shane Burke
manifest.name: Auto Archive
manifest.description: Automatically archive notes once they reach a certain age

manifest.author: Dillon Cutaiar
manifest.name: Song Links
manifest.description: Insert a link to the song currently playing on your Spotify

manifest.author: rusi
manifest.name: Colorful Note Borders
manifest.description: Add customizable colorful borders to notes based on folder location or frontmatter metadata, enhancing visual organization in Obsidian.
